name: Balloon Run (PaulMagnus)
description:
The snotty children are running with scissors. That's bad. They want to pop your balloon! Stay away from them and move as far as possible. You get 1 point for each meter you distance yourself from your start position and lose if anyone touches you.

This is an endless runner where you can never stop moving.

Made for Valmuen Game Jam 2018.
https://www.valmuen.no/vgj

Controls:
A, D: Turn left or right
alt-F4: Exit the game

If a kid touches you you will get the message "YOU LOST!" That means you should restart the game, because you lost, but there is no actual built-in consequence when this happens.

It is possible to spawn inside a building. If that happens, restart the game.
